attributes.action: Curriculum Changes are confusing students across England.
attributes.background: We think that the changes in the curriculum are negatively affecting our generation. How can we succeed when our futures are being predetermined overnight. We want more information on these changes so we can achieve the best grades possible.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
